channel.title: pudding on Flo's Food and Drink
channel.description: Recent content in pudding on Flo's Food and Drink

item.title: Baked Rice Pudding
item.description: Ingredients: 250g pudding (short grain) rice 1200ml milk 70g caster sugar 1 teaspoon vanilla extract Pinch of Cinammon 4 tablespoons brown sugar Whipped cream to serve Method: Preheat oven to 150 degrees C Place the pudding rice in a ceramic dish In a saucepan, place the milk, caster sugar and vanilla extract. Bring to the boil. Pour the boiling liquid over the rice and cover the ceramic dish with tin foil.

item.title: Sticky Pudding
item.description: Ingredients For the pudding: 125g butter 1 tbsp golden syrup 1 tbsp black treacle 2 large free range eggs 1 tsp vanilla extract 150g self-raising flour 150g light muscovado sugar 150g medjool dates, chopped 2 tsp bicarbonate soda Tub of vanilla ice cream, to serve **For the sauce: ** 100g unsalted butter 150g dark muscovado sugar 3 tbsp golden syrup 150ml double cream 1 tsp vanilla extract Generous pinch sea salt Method
